com.socialize.networks
Interface SocialNetworkSharer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSocialNetworkSharer, FacebookSharer, TwitterSharer
public interface SocialNetworkSharer

Shares entities to a social network.

Author:
Jason Polites

Method Summary
 void share(Activity context, Entity entity, PropagationInfo urlSet, String comment, boolean autoAuth, ActionType type, SocialNetworkListener listener)
          Shares the given entity to the given social network.
 

Method Detail

share

void share(Activity context,
           Entity entity,
           PropagationInfo urlSet,
           String comment,
           boolean autoAuth,
           ActionType type,
           SocialNetworkListener listener)
Shares the given entity to the given social network.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The entity to be shared.
urlSet - The set of urls to be used in the share.
comment - The comment provided by the user.
autoAuth - If true authentication will be attempted automatically.
listener - A listener to handle callbacks from the post.
